sections.heading: Overview
content:
An award-winning journalist, Robin K. Levinson is the author of Safe
Eating, If You Think You Have Depression, If You Think You Have Seasonal
Affective Disorder, Are You Considering Cosmetic Surgery, A Woman Doctor's
Guide to Osteoporosis, and A Woman Doctor's Guide to Infertility .
She currently writes for a variety of consumer health web sites
© 2005 - 2026 WebMD LLC, an Internet Brands company. All rights reserved. WebMD does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. See additional information.
